      • findNextNonAlphaNum

        public static int findNextNonAlphaNum(java.lang.String s,
                      int fromIndex)
        Returns:
        s.length() or index of nonalphanumeric character Note does NOT return -1 if the rest are all alphanumeric, returns s.length in that case Returns -1 if s == null. returns s.length() if fromIndex is too big
